embed.description: League of Legends Competition Ruling Player: RG Dayshifted Team: Rich Gang Region: Oceania Date of Ruling: February 27th 2015 Subject: Violation of Summoner's Code, Violation of Oceanic Pro League Ruleset Facts As part of ongoing monitoring efforts we became aware that Dayshifted had been particularly abusive in a number of games.

replies.body: they're letting OCE down. they should be the ones to represent us at worlds.
